desc.ai: Artificial intelligence (AI) is when a computer program is taught to “think” like a human and based on its teachings be able to perform tasks unique to humans, such as problem-solving. Artificial intelligence is associated with machine learning.
desc.big_data: Big data is a concept in which large amounts of information are gathered in order to find patterns and connections within the data.

ml.title: Machine Learning
ml.desc: Machine learning is a technique in which you show a program what is and is not what it wants to identify. Based on that data, it will begin to make its own assumptions on what “is” and “is not.”
